column1: Little Goat Diner////My friend Paige posted a picture on twitter of one of Little Goat's adorable branded coffee cups and my brain went
column2: "YOU should go to Little Goat." And I was all
column4: I'm trying to go back to sleep." But my brain wouldn't shut up about diner food and the fact that it's Stephanie Izard diner food and finally I got out of bed and got on the train.
